text: 3.9 Ais 30.18, Hab 2.3, Lom 2.4, 1 Ti 2.4, Hib 10.37, 1 Pi 3.20 Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli apal, Bɨawl ak ne takaw ne aglak ak, saynsayn geb apal. Pen mel ak. Bɨawl ak ne takaw ne aglak ak saynsayn ma geb. Ne pen binɨb olap pɨsnep tɨmel gɨl kul gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl ma nɨgup. Binɨb mɨdupsek kɨli tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨnɨgel agɨl gos nɨgup. Anɨb ak yɨp yɨl ownɨmɨb agɨl, nɨbop yɨlɨk ma nɨŋɨd kod mɨdeb.
